original_text: For as the Father has life in himself, so he has granted the Son also to have life in himself.
korean_text: 아버지께서 자기 속에 생명이 있음 같이 아들에게도 생명을 주어 그 속에 있게 하셨고

sentences.original_text: For as the Father has life in himself
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지께서 자신 안에 생명이 있으신 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so he has granted the Son also
